
APPS:
{
    "metadata": {
        "name": "found",
        "creationTimestamp": null
    },
    "spec": {
        "secrets": [
            {
                "secret": "found.secret",
                "target": "found"
            }
        ]
    },
    "status": {
        "columns": {},
        "appImage": {
            "imageData": {},
            "vcs": {}
        },
        "appSpec": {},
        "appStatus": {},
        "defaults": {}
    }
}

{
    "metadata": {
        "name": "found.container",
        "creationTimestamp": null
    },
    "spec": {
        "appName": "found"
    },
    "status": {
        "columns": {},
        "state": {},
        "lastState": {},
        "ready": false,
        "restartCount": 0,
        "image": "",
        "imageID": ""
    }
}

    "metadata": {
        "name": "found.vol",

        "appPublicName": "found",
        "volumeName": "vol",
